name: private-captcha
tagline: A self-hosted CAPTCHA system focused on user privacy
description: PrivateCaptcha is a self-hosted CAPTCHA system designed to prevent unwanted submissions without relying on third-party services. It supports customizable widgets and easy integration for privacy-conscious apps.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Prevent spam and bot submissions without relying on third-party CAPTCHA services

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: No user data sent to external services, ensuring complete privacy compliance

features.title: REST API
features.description: Simple API and JavaScript widgets for quick integration into web forms

features.title: Multiple Challenge Types
features.description: Support for image-based, text-based, and mathematical challenges

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor CAPTCHA solve rates, failure patterns, and potential attack attempts
